text: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform and conducting our business.

3. Data Sharing and Disclosure

3.2 Legal Requirements

We may disclose information if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
This Privacy Policy and Terms of Service outline how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform and conducting our business.
We retain personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.
